content.rendered:
Directed by Sean Anders. John Morris

Written by Sean Anders. Charles Dickens. John Morris

Star Ryan Reynolds(Clint Briggs). Will Ferrell(Present).Joe Tippett. Aimee Carrero(Nora).Octavia Spencer. Sunita Mani(Past). Jen Tullock(Wendy). P.J. Byrne(Mr. Alteli). Amanda Cleghorn(Dancer). Marlow Barkley(Wren). Heidi Garza(Ghost world / tree grower dancer). Anastasia Mousis Sanidopoulos(Ghost / Tree Grower Dancer). Lily Sullivan(HR Ghost). Michelle Lulic(Mom).Patrick Page. Chloe Arnold(Senator Langer). Arasha Lalani(Co-Worker). Marilyn Swick(Holiday Shopper). Nico Tirozzi(Young Clint). Elle Shaheen(Tree Grower, Dancer). Alison Weller(1800s Street Vendor). Cheyenne Perez(Recruit Woman). Mary Ann Schaub(Neighbor). Ivan ‘Flipz’ Velez(Ghost). Maximilian Lee Piazza(Josh). Nick Baga(Tree Grower). Gavin Maddox Bergman(Oliver Twist). Sky Vaux Fuller(Ragamuffin Girl). Kevin Craig West(Tree Grower / Steve). Jade Missy Kim(Josh’s sister). Maud Arnold(Maud). Ian Dolley(Woodrow). Billy Concha(Fish n Chips Guy). Omar Khan(New York Tourist). Kevin Daigneault(Kal Sky Skating Rink Vendor). Phineas Clark(Ghost / Dancer). Bhanu Gopal(Father). Emelia Camille Harewood(Nora’s Daughter). Ilia Jessica Castro(Dancer). Ahmed Zakzouk(Dancer). Woody Fu(Charlie). Abby Fanucci(New York City Family – Daughter). Tierre Diaz(Coat Check). Daelan Dalton(Baby). Peter Brownlee(Briggs Employee). Elijah Carvalho(Nora’s Son). Jessica Rockwood(Ghost World Dancer). Brian Bradbury(Mourner). Khalid Hill(Dancer). Greg Swartz(Support Ghost).Loren Woods. Maddox Dalton(Baby). Sam McCrea(Tree Grower). Marcela Jaramillo(Finance Staff at Xmas party). Christin Rills(Ghost World Dancer). Martin Lee(Josh’s Dad). Taavon Gamble(Tree Grower). Julian William Carlson(Middle School Kid). Lincoln Rulman(Classroom Student / vigil scene). Alex Barber(Mall Kid (uncredited)). Keith R Beck(Mall Teen (uncredited)). Francois Bessing(Tree Grower / Ghost (uncredited)). Cody Corelli(Mall Teen (uncredited)). Hannah Crowley-Paolillo(Mom in Mall (uncredited)). Ian Dylan Hunt(Homeless Man, Mr. Bryan Employee (uncredited)). Christina Largent(Tree Grower (uncredited)). Rob Lévesque(Pub Patron (uncredited)). Valerie Martin(New York Bystander (uncredited)). Anne Reardon(Office worker (uncredited)). Nohra Wiksten(Mall Kid (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Sean Anders. George Dewey. Jessica Elbaum. Will Ferrell. David Koplan. John Morris. Diana Pokorny. Ryan Reynolds. Daniel Silverberg

Production Gloria Sanchez Productions. Maximum Effort. Mosaic
